item.description:
Meet across from the Brookline Village T station on Station Street.

There are 3 hour and 10 hour parking meters on Station street, on Kent St and in the 2 municipal lots accessible from Kent St. From Harvard St turn on to Station St and if you don't find a spot there take the first left doubling back on Kent St.

We will walk from there over to Jamaica pond, do one lap around the pond and head back. I drove by today and saw that the path around the pond was cleared and sanded.

Lunch afterwards at
http://www.villagesmo...
item.name: Jamaica Pond walk
